query:
SELECT 
            s.id,
            s.metadata_id as "metadata_id!",
            m.data_size as "size!",
            s.created_at as "created_at!"
        FROM 
            snapshots s
        INNER JOIN 
            metadata m ON m.id = s.metadata_id
        WHERE 
            s.id = $1 AND m.bucket_id = $2;
